Index.title: Free Barcode Generator is an online tool that allows users to easily create various formats of barcodes and QR codes. It supports multiple encoding types and enables users to generate barcodes in real-time and in bulk, completely free of charge.

content.faq:
# Free Barcode Generator FAQ

## 1. What is a Free Barcode Generator?

A Free Barcode Generator is an online tool that allows users to easily create various formats of barcodes and QR codes. It supports multiple encoding types and enables users to generate barcodes in real-time and in bulk, completely free of charge.

## 2. How do I use this barcode generator?

Using it is simple:
- Enter the content you want to encode in the input box, with each line corresponding to one barcode.
- Use the tabs to switch between different encoding types (such as 1D barcodes, QR codes, etc.).
- Select the encoding format and barcode style in the options.
- The system will generate the corresponding barcode or QR code in real-time.

## 3. What types of barcodes does this tool support?

Our tool supports various common barcode formats, including but not limited to:
- 1D barcodes: such as EAN-13, UPC-A, Code 39, Code 128, etc.
- 2D codes: such as QR codes, Data Matrix, Aztec Code, etc.
You can check the specific supported types in the tool's tabs and options.

## 4. Can I generate multiple barcodes at once?

Yes, this tool supports bulk generation. You just need to enter one barcode content per line in the input box, and the system will generate a corresponding barcode for each line of content.

## 5. Can I customize the style of the generated barcodes?

Yes. In the options section, you can adjust the format and style of the barcode, such as size, color, margins, etc., to meet your specific needs.

## 6. How do I download or save the generated barcodes?

Generated barcodes can usually be saved by right-clicking and selecting "Save Image As". For bulk-generated barcodes, we provide a packaged download option, allowing you to download all generated barcodes at once.

## 7. Are the barcodes generated by this tool legally valid?

The barcodes generated by our tool are technically accurate, but whether they have legal validity depends on your intended use and relevant regulations. If you need them for commercial purposes, we recommend consulting relevant industry standards and legal requirements.

## 8. Is there a fee to use this tool?

No. As the name suggests, this is a completely free barcode generator. You can use it to generate the barcodes you need without any restrictions and without paying any fees.

## 9. What's the quality of the generated barcodes? Are they suitable for printing?

The barcodes generated by our tool have high-quality resolution and are completely suitable for printing. However, we recommend conducting small-scale tests before formal large-scale use to ensure they can be scanned and recognized normally in your specific application scenarios.

## 10. Can I use this tool on mobile devices?

Yes, our barcode generator is web-based and compatible with various devices. Whether you're using a computer, tablet, or smartphone, you can conveniently access and use this tool.
